data.eml:eml: The taxonomic and phylogenetic status of some poorly known Anolis species from the Andes of Colombia with the description of a nomen nudum taxon

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grisales-Martínez, Freddy A., Velasco, Julián A., Bolívar, Wilmar, Williams, Ernest E., Daza, Juan M. (2017): The taxonomic and phylogenetic status of some poorly known Anolis species from the Andes of Colombia with the description of a nomen nudum taxon. Zootaxa 4303 (2): 213-230, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4303.2.2
